ARABIC: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَهُمْ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤْفَكُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: If you asked them who created them, they would say, 'Allah!' So how have they been perverted?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: If you ask them who created them, they will answer: "God." How then can they turn away?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: If you were to ask them: “Who created them?” they will surely say: “Allah.” Whence are they, then, being led astray?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), if you ask them, "Who had created the idols?" They will certainly say, "God has created them." Why do you then turn away from God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And if you ask them as to Who created them, they will surely answer “Allah” – so where are they reverting?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And if you ask them who created them, they will surely say: "Allah." How then are they turned away
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And if you should ask them who created them, they would certainly say: Allah. Whence are they then turned back?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: If thou askest them, 'Who created you?' they will say, 'God.' How then are they perverted?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And if thou ask them who created them, they will surely say: Allah. How then are they turned away?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And if you ask them who created them, they will surely say, God. How then are they turned away?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And wert thou to ask them who created them, they will surely say: God. Witherward then are they deviating!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: If you ask them, ‘Who created them?’ they will surely say, ‘Allah.’ Then where do they stray?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: If thou ask them, who created them, they will certainly say, Allah: How then are they deluded away (from the Truth)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And if you ask them who created them, they will surely say: "Allah". How then are they turned away (from the worship of Allah, Who created them)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Yet if you ask them: 'Who created you' they will say: 'Allah' How then can they turn away from Him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And if you asked them, “Who created them?”, they would say, “God.” Why then do they deviate?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And if you asked them who created them, they would surely say, "Allah." So how are they deluded?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:87] And if (wa-la-in: the lām is for oaths) you ask them who created them, they will surely say, ‘God’ (layaqūlunna: the indicative nūn and the [plural] person indicator wāw have been omitted). How can they then deviate?, [how] can they be turned away from worshipping God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And if thou ask them) i.e. the Banu Malih (who created them, they will surely say: Allah) created us. (How then are they turned away) from whence do they lie against Allah after such a confession?
